content:
I am writing one angular client connecting to difference FHIR server. I notice there are always tiny difference from server to server. For example, Cerner server enforce conditional update. So I must add If-Match header. HSPC server doesn't allow conditional update. So I must remove If-Match header. These differences cause lots of if-else blocks in my code. And I don't even want to think about DSTU2 vs STU3.
I am just wondering, as a client implementer, how do you solve this problem?
Thanks
